DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of dimebon given to Alzheimer's disease patients currently on a stable dose and regimen of memantine or memantine plus donepezil.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of Dimebon in Patients on Memantine, and Memantine Plus Donepezil
DOC.criteria: Alzheimer's disease On Memantine Caregiver who is willing to accompany the patient to all clinic visits Unstable medical illnesses or significant hepatic or renal disease Other primary psychiatric or neurological disorders
